2833.name: BANNED_DEVICE_IN_APPLICATION_TEMPORARILY
2833.message:
Online services cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2833.short_description: Your console is temporarily banned from this application
2833.long_description: Your console has been temporarily banned from this application for breaking the rules.
2833.short_solution: Wait for the ban to expire
2833.long_solution: Wait for the ban to expire or appeal it on the forum.
